resources.title: Full Stack Deep Learning
resources.description: Learn to design, train, and deploy deep learning systems. Covers the full stack from data collection to production deployment and monitoring.

resources.title: Stanford CS224N: NLP with Deep Learning
resources.description: Deep dive into Natural Language Processing using deep learning. Covers word vectors, RNNs, transformers, and question answering systems.

resources.title: Deep Learning Specialization
resources.description: Five-course specialization covering deep learning fundamentals to advanced applications. Includes hands-on projects and real-world case studies.

resources.title: MLOps Zoomcamp
resources.description: Free course on MLOps fundamentals. Learn to deploy ML models, monitor them in production, and maintain ML systems at scale.

resources.title: Fast.ai: Practical Deep Learning
resources.description: Top-down approach to deep learning. Learn to build practical applications before diving into theory. Includes extensive code examples.

resources.title: MIT 6.S191: Introduction to Deep Learning
resources.description: MIT's introductory course to deep learning methods. Includes lectures, labs, and software tutorials with real-world applications.

resources.title: Berkeley CS 182: Deep Learning
resources.description: Berkeley's deep learning course covering advanced topics like GANs, VAEs, and modern architectures with practical applications.

resources.title: ML Production Engineering
resources.description: End-to-end course on building production ML systems. Covers data pipelines, model serving, and monitoring with modern tools.

resources.title: Advanced Computer Architecture
resources.description: Deep dive into modern processor design, memory hierarchies, and parallel architectures. Includes hands-on projects with hardware description languages.

resources.title: Blockchain Development
resources.description: Comprehensive course on blockchain development. Covers Ethereum, smart contracts, and decentralized application architecture.

resources.title: Cloud Computing Specialization
resources.description: In-depth study of cloud computing concepts. Covers AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud platforms with hands-on projects.

resources.title: Compiler Construction
resources.description: Stanford's compiler course. Build a complete compiler from scratch, covering lexing, parsing, and code generation.

resources.title: Cryptography I
resources.description: Stanford's cryptography course. Covers encryption, authentication, and cryptographic protocols with mathematical foundations.

resources.title: Data Engineering with Python
resources.description: Comprehensive data engineering course. Covers ETL pipelines, data warehousing, and big data processing frameworks.

resources.title: Embedded Systems Design
resources.description: Hands-on course in embedded systems programming. Covers microcontrollers, real-time operating systems, and IoT applications.

resources.title: Functional Programming in Scala
resources.description: EPFL's Scala programming course. Covers functional programming principles, parallel programming, and big data processing.

resources.title: Game Engine Development
resources.description: Build a game engine from scratch. Covers graphics programming, physics simulation, and game architecture design.

resources.title: High Performance Computing
resources.description: Advanced course in parallel computing. Covers MPI, OpenMP, and GPU programming for scientific applications.

resources.title: Information Security
resources.description: Comprehensive information security course. Covers risk management, security policies, and incident response.

resources.title: JavaScript Performance
resources.description: Advanced JavaScript performance optimization. Covers memory management, rendering performance, and network optimization.

resources.title: Kubernetes for Developers
resources.description: Practical Kubernetes course for developers. Covers container orchestration, deployment strategies, and microservices architecture.

resources.title: Machine Learning Operations
resources.description: End-to-end MLOps course. Covers model deployment, monitoring, and maintenance in production environments.

resources.title: Network Security
resources.description: Offensive Security's penetration testing course. Covers network attacks, exploitation, and security assessments.

resources.title: Operating System Engineering
resources.description: MIT's operating system course. Build an operating system from scratch using the xv6 teaching operating system.

resources.title: Programming Language Theory
resources.description: Advanced course in programming language design. Covers type theory, semantics, and language implementation.

resources.title: Quantum Computing
resources.description: MIT's quantum computing course. Covers quantum mechanics, quantum algorithms, and quantum programming frameworks.

resources.title: Robotics: Computational Motion Planning
resources.description: Advanced robotics course. Covers path planning algorithms, manipulation planning, and motion control.

resources.title: Software Architecture & Design
resources.description: Comprehensive software architecture course. Covers design patterns, architectural styles, and system design principles.

resources.title: Advanced Computer Networks
resources.description: Deep dive into modern networking protocols and architectures. Covers SDN, NFV, and network virtualization.

resources.title: Bioinformatics Algorithms
resources.description: Computational methods for analyzing biological data. Covers sequence alignment, phylogenetics, and structural analysis.

resources.title: Cloud Security Architecture
resources.description: Security design patterns for cloud systems. Covers identity management, encryption, and compliance.

resources.title: Distributed Database Systems
resources.description: Design and implementation of distributed databases. Covers sharding, replication, and consistency models.

resources.title: Edge Computing and IoT
resources.description: Building edge computing applications. Covers sensor networks, real-time processing, and edge AI.

resources.title: Formal Methods in Software Engineering
resources.description: Applying formal methods to software development. Covers specification languages, verification, and validation.

resources.title: GPU Computing
resources.description: Parallel programming with GPUs. Covers CUDA, OpenCL, and parallel algorithms optimization.

resources.title: Hardware Security
resources.description: Security aspects of hardware design. Covers side-channel attacks, secure boot, and hardware trojans.

resources.title: Information Theory and Coding
resources.description: Fundamentals of information theory. Covers entropy, source coding, and error correction.

resources.title: Julia for Scientific Computing
resources.description: Scientific computing with Julia. Covers numerical methods, parallel computing, and performance optimization.

resources.title: Knowledge Graphs and Semantic Web
resources.description: Building and querying knowledge graphs. Covers RDF, SPARQL, and ontology engineering.

resources.title: Low Latency Trading Systems
resources.description: Building high-frequency trading systems. Covers market microstructure, order matching, and risk management.

resources.title: Machine Learning Compilers

resources.title: Network Protocol Engineering

resources.description: Security mechanisms in operating systems. Covers access control, isolation, and secure boot.

resources.title: Program Analysis and Verification
